title: An Act relative to nonresident ban on semiautomatic hunting

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Sweezey of Duxbury and Frost of Auburn, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2710) of Kenneth P. Sweezey, Paul K. Frost and David F. DeCoste relative to nonresident ban on semiautomatic hunting.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
